content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity generator at position(2.5, 1.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Small electric pole (position 2.5, 1.5)

### Furnace at position(4.0, -62.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone furnace (position 4.0, -62.0) currently smelting iron plates using coal as fuel.

### Lab at position(2.5, 0.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Lab (position 2.5, 0.5) currently has automation science pack input but is without power.

### Copper plate mine at position(x)
Consists of the following entities:
- No updates to this structure.

### Copper cable factory
Consists of the following entities:
- No updates to this structure.

### Iron plate factory
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone furnace (position 4.0, -62.0) smelting iron plates.

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when crafting items
- Ensure you have all required sub-ingredients available in your inventory or accessible through a crafting machine or furnace before attempting to craft an item.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.
